title: Bill Announcement – The White House
content:
Statements & Releases			

		Law & Justice	

Issued on:
May 29, 2020
On Friday, May 29, 2020, the President signed into law:H.R. 943, the “Never Again Education Act,” which requires the United States Holocaust Memorial Museum to develop and disseminate resources to improve awareness and understanding of the Holocaust, and authorizes various Holocaust education program activities to engage prospective and current teachers and educational leaders.
